name: Cream Isles Part 1
description:
Nilly has been separated from her friend after a raging thunderstorm destroys their boat. Can you help Nilly find her lost friend, as well as rescue the princess and learn some new valuable abilities? Play the game and find out!

Get updates on this game and more on patreon 

ULTIMATE ROR PATREON!

and on TOON PIMP'S PALACE!
